name: QUICKERFLAK 2
description:
QUICKERFLAK 2 is a retro-hardcore room-beater time-attack super-fast-paced minigame that challenges you to move as fast as you can to the last room, mixing quick shooting, melee, and geometric perception.
Each room is guarded by intelligent enemies, calling for different approaches and nimble reactions.

With organic aesthetics, awesome music, and hard-boiled gameplay handcrafted by Walter Machado, QUICKERFLAK 2 maxed out the original QUICKERFLAK formula, adding melee and boosted versions of the classic enemies.
Welcome back to QUICKERFLAK!
